api_list.api_description: Retrieve the favicon for a specified domain. Optionally, specify the size of the favicon image.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain to retrieve the favicon from.

optional_parameters.name: sz
optional_parameters.description: A size hint for the favicon (e.g., 128, 256). Defaults to None, which returns the default size (usually 16x16).

query: Can you fetch the favicon icon of the Stack Overflow website?

api_list.api_description: Get information about a color in various formats and its contrasting text colors.

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: The color in Keyword, HEX, RGB, RGBA, HSL, or HSLA format.

query: I need to know the complementary and grayscale versions of the color aquamarine. Can you find this out?
